Doesn't just read the array but checks if it's out of the array. Furthermore, this returns true if it's not empty.

toVisit
- only these objects will be used. Found objects will be removed. Null = use all grid objects

parameterdescription.para: - only these objects will be "visited", may also be startObjects. null... use all grid objects EXCLUDING startObjects.

parameterdescription.para: - visited objects will be removed. Use all GridObjects if toVisit==null

detaileddescription.para:
New JGM image loading function
jgm
Provides most methods for editing the GridModel.
Initializes the GridMapListener. Loads images for the JGM (loadImagesNew) Adds and deletes GridObjects. Provides logics for neighbor detection and power-line drawing.
